thread.title: Trump says Democrats soft on illegal immigrants for votes | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Trump says Democrats soft on illegal immigrants for votes | Daily Mail Online

author: David Martosko
title: Trump says Democrats soft on illegal immigrants for votes | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad 'They think that's their voter!' Trump says Democrats are soft on illegal-immigrant criminals because 'violent foreign criminals' will support them Donald Trump told Fox News interviewer Bill O'Reilly that criminal aliens get a pass from Democrats because they're trying to secure their future support 'They think that's their voter!' Trump said in an interview, taped Friday, which aired Monday night The president has already claimed Hillary Clinton received 'millions' of illegal votes in November He was discussing liberal opposition to 'Kate's Law,' a bill named for 2015 murder victim Kate Steinle An illegal immigrant killed Steinle in San Francisco despite being deported on five occasions and re-entering the U.S. every time Kate's Law would guarantee a 5-year minimum prison sentence for people caught returning to the U.S. after deportation Published: 02:20 GMT, 7 February 2017 | Updated: 12:02 GMT, 7 February 2017 96 shares
